bug.author: unilight
bug.description:
I used template_multi_spk/voc1 to train on a custom dataset (VCC2018). The structure of the database followed the README. When I execute stage 0 and 1, it says: <denchmark-code>utils/make_subset_data.sh: 行 33: data/eval_all/wav.scp: そのようなファイルやディレクトリはありません utils/make_subset_data.sh: 行 33: data/dev_all/wav.scp: そのようなファイルやディレクトリはありません utils/make_subset_data.sh: 行 33: data/train_nodev_all/wav.scp: そのようなファイルやディレクトリはありません </denchmark-code>
The data directory looks like <denchmark-code>$ ls data dev_SF1/ dev_SF4/ dev_SM3/ dev_TF2/ eval_SF1/ eval_SF4/ eval_SM3/ eval_TF2/ train_nodev_SF1/ train_nodev_SF4/ train_nodev_SM3/ train_nodev_TF2/ dev_SF2/ dev_SM1/ dev_SM4/ dev_TM1/ eval_SF2/ eval_SM1/ eval_SM4/ eval_TM1/ train_nodev_SF2/ train_nodev_SM1/ train_nodev_SM4/ train_nodev_TM1/ dev_SF3/ dev_SM2/ dev_TF1/ dev_TM2/ eval_SF3/ eval_SM2/ eval_TF1/ eval_TM2/ train_nodev_SF3/ train_nodev_SM2/ train_nodev_TF1/ train_nodev_TM2/ </denchmark-code>
I suppose there is some problem...? Shall we use these argument? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kan-bayashi/ParallelWaveGAN/blob/master/egs/template_multi_spk/voc1/run.sh#L82-L84>https://github.com/kan-bayashi/ParallelWaveGAN/blob/master/egs/template_multi_spk/voc1/run.sh#L82-L84</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Oh, sorry. I forgot to add combine_data.sh. I will fix it.
It is working now. Thank you!
